carousel_items: Avoid activities requiring mental alertness (like driving) until you know how it affects you.
Can cause extreme drowsiness or dizziness if you're taking it with high blood pressure medications.
Side effects are more prevalent in the elderly.
Don't drink alcohol while using this.
Can be taken as needed or 'around-the-clock'. Ask your doctor about what'll work best for you.
If taking regularly, you need to work with your doctor to get off the medication slowly (also called tapering) to avoid withdrawal symptoms.

basics.benefits_moa: Baclofen is a muscle relaxer. It works in the nervous system to calm down muscle spasms without interfering with normal muscle function.
basics.bottom_line: Baclofen is effective for long term spastic conditions, such as multiple sclerosis, spinal cord injury, and others.
downsides: If taking regularly, you shouldn't stop taking Baclofen abruptly. You'll need to get off of it slowly.
Be careful if taking other drugs that affect your ability to stay awake, since Baclofen can make you much more tired.

downsides_processed.orig: If taking regularly, you shouldn't stop taking Baclofen abruptly. You'll need to get off of it slowly.
Be careful if taking other drugs that affect your ability to stay awake, since Baclofen can make you much more tired.

upsides: Baclofen is effective for treating muscle spasms, as well as being an effective muscle relaxant.
Relieves pain associated with muscle spasms.
A better option for seniors compared to other muscle relaxants since it has less side effects than the other meds.
Baclofen is available as a generic and is a relatively inexpensive medication.

upsides_processed.orig: Baclofen is effective for treating muscle spasms, as well as being an effective muscle relaxant.
Relieves pain associated with muscle spasms.
A better option for seniors compared to other muscle relaxants since it has less side effects than the other meds.
Baclofen is available as a generic and is a relatively inexpensive medication.

userStories.tip: Not a very helpful or safe drug

Good for muscle aches from withdrawal but no other improvements from opiate withdrawal. Worked really well for muscle cramps and pain though. Not help with insomnia.  I'm writing this review at 2:00am because I can't sleep.

drugs.name: baclofen

carousel_items_processed.orig: Avoid activities requiring mental alertness (like driving) until you know how it affects you.
Can cause extreme drowsiness or dizziness if you're taking it with high blood pressure medications.
Side effects are more prevalent in the elderly.
Don't drink alcohol while using this.
Can be taken as needed or 'around-the-clock'. Ask your doctor about what'll work best for you.
If taking regularly, you need to work with your doctor to get off the medication slowly (also called tapering) to avoid withdrawal symptoms.

risks_warnings.title: Muscle spasms and break down
risks_warnings.description: If taking the drug consistently, avoid stopping the drug abruptly. Stopping it too fast can cause serious muscle problems, sometimes even leading to organ failure. Risk is higher in patients with spinal injuries at T-6 or higher.

description_processed.orig: If taking the drug consistently, avoid stopping the drug abruptly. Stopping it too fast can cause serious muscle problems, sometimes even leading to organ failure. Risk is higher in patients with spinal injuries at T-6 or higher.

risks_warnings.title: Driving impairment
risks_warnings.description: Baclofen lowers your ability to focus, think, and react. Be careful. Avoid activities that require you to be alert, such as driving a car or operating machinery, until you know how this medication affects you.
risk_factors: Taking other medicines that make you less alert

description_processed.orig: Baclofen lowers your ability to focus, think, and react. Be careful. Avoid activities that require you to be alert, such as driving a car or operating machinery, until you know how this medication affects you.

risks_warnings.title: Seizures
risks_warnings.description: Baclofen can lower the brain's threshold for seizures in people with certain risk factors. Use with caution.
risk_factors: Using other medicines that can cause seizures

description_processed.orig: Baclofen can lower the brain's threshold for seizures in people with certain risk factors. Use with caution.

carousel_items: Can cause dizziness, fatigue, drowsiness, and dry mouth.
Avoid activities requiring mental alertness (like driving) until you know how it affects you.
Can cause extreme drowsiness or dizziness if you are taking meds for high blood pressure.
Side effects are more prevalent in the elderly.
Don't drink alcohol while using this.
Can be taken with or without food, but you need to be consistent since food affects how the medication is absorbed and works.

basics.benefits_moa: Tizanidine is a muscle relaxer. It works in the nervous system to calm down muscle spasms without interfering with normal muscle function.
basics.bottom_line: Tizanidine isn't a first-choice treatment for muscle spasms. Try other options before using this.
downsides: This isn't a first-choice muscle relaxing medication. Other drugs work better and have fewer side effects.
Tizanidine can lower blood pressure, so be careful if you are already on a blood pressure medication.
Need to be consistent every day in taking this with or without food.
Elderly individuals have more side effects when taking Tizanidine.
Can't stop taking this abruptly if you use it regularly.

downsides_processed.orig: This isn't a first-choice muscle relaxing medication. Other drugs work better and have fewer side effects.
Tizanidine can lower blood pressure, so be careful if you are already on a blood pressure medication.
Need to be consistent every day in taking this with or without food.
Elderly individuals have more side effects when taking Tizanidine.
Can't stop taking this abruptly if you use it regularly.

upsides: Can be taken with or without food, but you need to be consistent in how you take it every day.
Available in a tablet or capsule form. It also comes in a capsule that can be opened and sprinkled in applesauce for people that can't swallow pills.

upsides_processed.orig: Can be taken with or without food, but you need to be consistent in how you take it every day.
Available in a tablet or capsule form. It also comes in a capsule that can be opened and sprinkled in applesauce for people that can't swallow pills.

userStories.identifier: taken for spasms after spine surgery

userStories.tip: I found it worked well in the beginning---after awhile started waking up after 2-3 hours and couldnt get back to sleep  I believe it gets me angry , [ easily aroused pissed off]  more than if i leave it alone.
userStories.indication: hernia, mesh, nerve damage pain  sleep

userStories.tip: Helpful alternative to relieve migraine pain

drugs.name: Zanaflex

carousel_items_processed.orig: Can cause dizziness, fatigue, drowsiness, and dry mouth.
Avoid activities requiring mental alertness (like driving) until you know how it affects you.
Can cause extreme drowsiness or dizziness if you are taking meds for high blood pressure.
Side effects are more prevalent in the elderly.
Don't drink alcohol while using this.
Can be taken with or without food, but you need to be consistent since food affects how the medication is absorbed and works.

risks_warnings.title: Liver damage
risks_warnings.description: Tizanidine can damage your liver. You'll need to get blood tests done to check how your liver is functioning if you're taking this regularly.

description_processed.orig: Tizanidine can damage your liver. You'll need to get blood tests done to check how your liver is functioning if you're taking this regularly.

risks_warnings.title: Falls caused by low blood pressure
risks_warnings.description: Can cause significant hypotension (low blood pressure) in older people. Be cautious when using this medication, especially when taking other blood pressure drugs, because low blood pressure can make people unsteady and more likely to fall.

description_processed.orig: Can cause significant hypotension (low blood pressure) in older people. Be cautious when using this medication, especially when taking other blood pressure drugs, because low blood pressure can make people unsteady and more likely to fall.

risks_warnings.title: Driving impairment
risks_warnings.description: Tizanidine lowers your ability to focus, think, and react. Be careful. Avoid activities that require you to be alert, such as driving a car or operating machinery, until you know how this medication affects you.
risk_factors: Taking other medicines that make you less alert

description_processed.orig: Tizanidine lowers your ability to focus, think, and react. Be careful. Avoid activities that require you to be alert, such as driving a car or operating machinery, until you know how this medication affects you.

risks_warnings.title: Withdrawal side effects
risks_warnings.description: If you're taking this medication regularly and suddenly stop taking it, you can experience serious withdrawal symptoms, including really high blood pressure and a fast heart rate. In order to stop taking this medication, lower your dose slowly over multiple weeks.

description_processed.orig: If you're taking this medication regularly and suddenly stop taking it, you can experience serious withdrawal symptoms, including really high blood pressure and a fast heart rate. In order to stop taking this medication, lower your dose slowly over multiple weeks.

carousel_items: Can cause drowsiness, headache, dizziness, and dry mouth.
For ADHD: Might take up to 2 weeks to see effects.
For high blood pressure: Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
If side effects don't go away, talk to your doctor about alternatives.
Don't stop taking this medicine suddenly.

basics.benefits_moa: Clonidine is an alpha-2 agonist. Researchers don't know exactly how it works for ADHD. It works in the brain and lowers the activity of certain stress hormones, but it's not a stimulant like many ADHD medicines.
basics.bottom_line: Clonidine is a non-stimulant option to manage ADHD symptoms and behaviors, but it can lower your blood pressure.
downsides: The pill form can make some people sleepy, dizzy, and have dry mouth.
You can't miss doses. Stopping Clonidine suddenly can cause your blood pressure to go up suddenly, which raises the risk of heart attack and stroke.

downsides_processed.orig: The pill form can make some people sleepy, dizzy, and have dry mouth.
You can't miss doses. Stopping Clonidine suddenly can cause your blood pressure to go up suddenly, which raises the risk of heart attack and stroke.

upsides: Can be used alone or together with a stimulant-type medicine to treat ADHD.
In studies, it improved attention span and lowered hyperactivity and impulsivity in children and adolescents ages 6 to 17.
Also treats blood pressure and some nervous system and psychiatric conditions.

upsides_processed.orig: Can be used alone or together with a stimulant-type medicine to treat ADHD.
In studies, it improved attention span and lowered hyperactivity and impulsivity in children and adolescents ages 6 to 17.
Also treats blood pressure and some nervous system and psychiatric conditions.

drugs.one_liner: Treats ADHD and lowers blood pressure.
drugs.name: Kapvay

carousel_items_processed.orig: Can cause drowsiness, headache, dizziness, and dry mouth.
For ADHD: Might take up to 2 weeks to see effects.
For high blood pressure: Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
If side effects don't go away, talk to your doctor about alternatives.
Don't stop taking this medicine suddenly.

risks_warnings.title: Withdrawal (rebound hypertension)
risks_warnings.description: Stopping Clonidine suddenly can cause agitation, headache, tremors, and a sudden rise of blood pressure that can produce complications. Clonidine should be stopped over 2-4 days with the supervision of a doctor. If using with a beta blocker medicine, slowly stop the beta blocker first before stopping Clonidine.

description_processed.orig: Stopping Clonidine suddenly can cause agitation, headache, tremors, and a sudden rise of blood pressure that can produce complications. Clonidine should be stopped over 2-4 days with the supervision of a doctor. If using with a beta blocker medicine, slowly stop the beta blocker first before stopping Clonidine.

risks_warnings.title: Driving impairment
risks_warnings.description: Clonidine impairs your ability to focus, think, and react. Be careful. Avoid activities that require you to be alert, such as driving a car or operating machinery, until you know how this medication affects you.
risk_factors: Taking other medicines that make you less alert

description_processed.orig: Clonidine impairs your ability to focus, think, and react. Be careful. Avoid activities that require you to be alert, such as driving a car or operating machinery, until you know how this medication affects you.

risks_warnings.title: Low heart rate (bradycardia)
risks_warnings.description: Clonidine can lower your heart rate too much. Talk to your doctor if you continue to feel dizzy, tired or getting out  of breath doing things you normally can do after using Clonidine for a week.
risk_factors: Using other medicine(s) that slows the heart

description_processed.orig: Clonidine can lower your heart rate too much. Talk to your doctor if you continue to feel dizzy, tired or getting out  of breath doing things you normally can do after using Clonidine for a week.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure (hypotension)
risks_warnings.description: Clonidine can lower your blood pressure. Monitor your blood pressure in the first week of taking Clonidine. Let your doctor know if you continue to feel dizzy after 1 week of use.

description_processed.orig: Clonidine can lower your blood pressure. Monitor your blood pressure in the first week of taking Clonidine. Let your doctor know if you continue to feel dizzy after 1 week of use.
